metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0151 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from12.10 before 14.4.5, all versions starting from 14.5.0 before 14.5.3, allversions starting from 14.6.0 before 14.6.2. GitLab was not correctlyhandling requests to delete existing packages which could result in aDenial of Service under specific conditions.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
